channel.title: About on xtrafrood
channel.description: Recent content in About on xtrafrood

item.description: Purpose of this website An online home for all my notes, and future projects. Shorthand used in the notes (& ~/.bashrc aliases) apti == sudo aptitude install aptr == sudo aptitude remove sudov == sudo vim (When I use anything else I leave behind random characters like: :wq) sudor == sudo ranger (Python based TUI file manager–not great for moving around lots of data, but perfect for the quickness) sudoc == sudo chmod +X (make script executable) bashrc == vim ~/.
